ShortDescription.Value: Increases number of workers and other small adjustments for Service Buildings.

Publish.LongDescription:
**Config-XML**
Tweak and modify Service buildings to your liking. By default, you could just install this mod and use it as-is with no configuration.
### Quick-Start
- ✅ Just select "PRESETS" and play, done (list of changes already included). - Curated presets increase the **number of workers** and a few other small adjustments (details below). - Wages are scaled up/down based on the number of workers - done automatically by the game (we just tweak worker counts). - Think of this mod as a simple text-like file that players can edit (or not since a nice preset file is included). - Change is applied before any city is loaded, so there is no performance impact.
Number of **preset** buildings and extensions: **222**.
### Curated Presets - All buildings have more workplaces. The required education level for jobs is also adjusted in 'some' buildings, and other allowed tweaks. - Presets design: some have only a few more workers (2), and some have many. This better utilizes large buildings that previously had few workers, and may help reduce unemployment. - Examples: University is normally 170 workers, this mod preset increases it to 400 as this is a big campus for 15,000 students. - Existing buildings need to be rebuilt to see new config changes.
- Add these companion mods to also Increase Students or Transit Passengers - See Power Users if you want to adjust the presets yourself.
### Power Users - Easily tweak all player adjustable config file as you wish. - ✅ Open Options > Custom > [Open Config folder] to create a customizable Config.xml file. - Refer to info / examples in Config.xml for how to add / alter components (edit with Notepad++ or similar). - New changes can be "Applied" even during the game without a restart (options menu).
### Notes
- DLC entries only work if you own the DLC and can plop the items. - Safety: mod does **not** modify save files or any game systems. - Can be removed at any time - already plopped buildings retain modded values and new buildings will have vanilla values. - Performance: this is a lightweight configuration mod. It only does a short pass when applying settings (on game load or when you click APPLY). It does not add any per-frame systems, so it essentially has no impact on performance. - Works with mods: Adjust School, Adjust Transit, Magic Mail, Magic Garbage, as this mod is focused on the number of workers and those do not. - Magic Hearse and Achievement Fixer also works with this. - Pretty much any mod that doesn't also adjust worker numbers should be good. - Technically, this mod allows for virtually any changes to Service buildings. At the moment, it mainly increases number of workers in Services buildings and does other small adjustments. I encourage contribution to the mod and PRs on GitHub with proposed changes and rationale.
